scripts.deploy:dodoex_bsc: graph codegen subgraphs/dodoex_bsc.yaml --output-dir ./src/types/dodoex/ && graph deploy --debug --ipfs https://api.bscgraph.org/ --node https://api.bscgraph.org/deploy dodoex-v2 subgraphs/dodoex_bsc.yaml
